title: Money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010
summary: This graph describes the amount of Money spent on higher education in 2010 .
\n The title states the data is limited to Asia , but the dataset proves to show the global data , separated by continents : North_America , Europe Asia , Africa .
\n The data is shown in units of million Pounds ( GBP ) .
gold: This graph explores the money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010 . The amount is in millions pounds . Asia spent £ 320 m which is 3 x more than europes total of £ 100 m .
